profile:
We are a COOPERATIVE. Locally owned. Over 1000 stores strong. We are the largest floorcovering buying group in North America.
Carpet adds warmth and style to any setting. Harwood takes an ordinary space and transforms it to extraordinary. Luxury Vinyl Tile products feature cutting edge technology to create floors so realistic thea they even fool the experts. Laminate offers high performance, installed flooring to give you the look of hardwood without the upkeep and expense. Tile to give you timeless beauty, an ideal complement to other types of flooring.
Area Rugs - largest selection in store - to accentuate your personal home style choice.
Knowledgeable and Excellence in Sales and Installs - Come in - Browse - Competively Priced.
